name: Unended
description:
Endless Explosive fun!

We don't know what that thing is, but we do know that if it doesn't keep running the entire universe might collapse! The only thing is, it's not that smart.

Can you keep it running (and beat my highscore)?

Features:

  • Playable Title Screen
  • Explosions!
  • Lazers!
  • Gore!
  • Infinitely long unique Levels!

Share a screenshot of your best score in the comments!
